api_surface.title: Which part of the API surface to analyze
api_surface.description:
- public (default): Applies to public and protected APIs
- internal: Applies to internal and private protected APIs
- private: Applies to private APIs
- all: Applies to all APIs
Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/code-quality-rule-options#api_surface

exclude_async_void_methods.title: Whether to ignore asynchronous methods that don't return a value
exclude_async_void_methods.description:
Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/code-quality-rule-options#exclude_async_void_methods
 ⚠️ This option was named `skip_async_void_methods` in an earlier version. ⚠️

exclude_single_letter_type_parameters.title: Whether to exclude single-character type parameters from the rule, for example, S in Collection<S>

output_kind.title: Specifies that code in a project that generates this type of assembly should be analyzed
output_kind.description:
One or more fields of the OutputKind enumeration.
- ConsoleApplication (0): An .exe with an entry point and a console.
- WindowsApplication (1): An .exe with an entry point but no console.
- DynamicallyLinkedLibrary (2): A .dll file.
- NetModule (3): A .netmodule file.
- WindowsRuntimeMetadata (4): A .winmdobj file.
- WindowsRuntimeApplication (5): An .exe that can run in an app container. Equivalent to a WindowsApplication, but with an extra bit set in the Portable Executable file so that the application can only be run in an app container. Also known as a "Windows Store app".
Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/code-quality-rule-options#output_kind

required_modifiers.title: Specifies the required modifiers for APIs that should be analyzed
required_modifiers.description:
- "none": No modifier requirement
or
- "static": Must be declared as "static"
- "const": Must be declared as "const"
- "readonly": Must be declared as "readonly"
- "abstract": Must be declared as "abstract"
- "virtual": Must be declared as "virtual"
- "override": Must be declared as "override"
- "sealed": Must be declared as "sealed"
- "extern": Must be declared as "extern"
- "async": Must be declared as "async"
Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/code-quality-rule-options#required_modifiers

exclude_extension_method_this_parameter.title: Whether to skip analysis for the this parameter of extension method

null_check_validation_methods.title: Names of null-check validation methods that validate that arguments passed to the method are non-null

additional_string_formatting_methods.title: Names of additional string formatting methods

excluded_type_names_with_derived_types.title: Names of types, such that the type and all its derived types are excluded for analysis

excluded_symbol_names.title: Names of symbols that are excluded for analysis

disallowed_symbol_names.title: Names of symbols that are disallowed in the context of the analysis

exclude_ordefault_methods.title: Excludes FirstOrDefault and LastOrDefault methods from analysis.

ignore_internalsvisibleto.title: Includes assemblies marked with InternalsVisibleToAttribute in analysis.

root.title: Root
root.description: Wether or not .editorconfig's higher in a directory should be inherited.

indent_style.title: Indent Style
indent_style.description: Which style the indentation should have.

indent_size.title: Indent Size
indent_size.description:
How many spaces the tab should have.
If 'indent_size' equals to "tab", the size will be set to the tab size, which should be 'tab_width'.

tab_width.title: Tab Width
tab_width.description: Defaults to 'indent_size' if it is an integer.

end_of_line.title: End of line
end_of_line.description:
Which character should be insertet at the end of a line.
lf = \n, crlf = \r\n, cr = \r

trim_trailing_whitespace.title: Trim trailing whitespace
trim_trailing_whitespace.description: Wether whitespaces at the end of lines should be removed or not.

insert_final_newline.title: Insert final newline
insert_final_newline.description: Wether or not to insert a new line at the of a file.

max_line_length.title: Max line length
max_line_length.description:
The maximal number of characters in a single line
WARNING: not supported by every editor.
Supported Editors:
• Emacs
• Vim
• Neovim
• Atom
• ReSharper and Rider
• AppCode, IntelliJ IDEA, PhpStorm, PyCharm, RubyMine, and WebStorm
• Kakoune
• Prettier
